Text: Thanks, I forgot about the elseworlds stories -
Ha ha - I did - b/c everytime I search for certain flashpoint issues I get this as a result LOL. Guessing you did too
just saw this at the comic shop the other day
Did you guys watch CBR's interview with Todd McFarlane about DC52, Digital DL's and Pirating - It was amazing. Everything he says makes me wish he was in charge of DC.

Thanks MM82.  Stellar comics as usual.

@MrDowntown -  That sounds really interesting, you have a link to that interview?

Interview link:

http://video.comicbookresources.com/cbrtv/2011/cbr-tv-cci-todd-mcfarlane-on-dc-comics-relaunch-spawn-robert-kirkman-more/

And though he tends to go out in left field on some issues, he's dead on about DC's initiative.

Wow, great stuff.  Thanks for sharing, I only read comicvine for my comic news so I never would of seen that.  Haven't thought of his point about the new 52 before..  For the hardcore consumer I think it's cool because of all the new books and new stories, but yeah, for the casual consumer they are trying to attract I don't see it maintaining interest.
MirrorMaster rules!! Thanks sooo much again, bro!!
